flavorText.text:
のんびりとした　せいかく。
かわぞこで　くちを　あけて　エサが
とびこんでくるのを　ひたすら　まつ。

のんびりとした　せいかくで
きままに　およいでは　いつも
ふなぞこに　あたまを　ぶつけている。

みずの　なかで　くちを　あけて　エサが　ぐうぜん
とびこんで　くるのを　ただただ　まっている。
うごかないので　あまり　おなかが　すかないのだ。

みずの　なかで　くちを　あけて　エサが　ぐうぜん
とびこんで　くるのを　ただただ　まっている。
うごかないので　あまり　おなかが　すかないのだ。

ふなぞこや　かわのいわに　あたまを
ぶつけまくっても　きにせず　きままに
およいでいる　のんきな　ポケモン。

からだは　いつも　ぬめっている。
およぐたびに　かわぞこに　あたまを
ぶつけているが　きに　していない。

느긋한 성격이다.
강바닥에서 입을 벌려 먹이가
들어오는 것을 한결같이 기다린다.

느긋한 성격으로
제멋대로 헤엄치고는 늘
배의 밑바닥에 머리를 들이받곤 한다.

물속에서 입을 열고 우연히 먹이가
뛰어들기를 그저 기다리고 있다.
움직이지 않기에 별로 배가 안 고프다.

물속에서 입을 열고 우연히 먹이가
뛰어들기를 그저 기다리고 있다.
움직이지 않기에 별로 배가 안 고프다.

배의 밑바닥이나 물가의 바위에
머리를 부딪쳐도 신경 쓰지 않고
헤엄치는 무사태평한 포켓몬이다.

몸은 항상 미끄럽다.
헤엄칠 때마다 강바닥에 머리를
부딪치지만 신경 쓰지 않는다.

就算腦袋撞上船底或河裡的岩石，
也完全不會去在意，悠然自在地
游泳的悠閒寶可夢。

身體總是滑溜溜的。
雖然游泳時頭總會撞到河底，
但牠自己毫不在意。

De nature placide, il a tendance à
se cogner la tête contre les récifs
et autres bateaux de passage.

De nature placide, il a tendance à
se cogner la tête contre les récifs
et autres bateaux de passage.

C’est un grand paresseux qui attend au fond de
la rivière qu’une proie lui tombe dans le bec.

Ce Pokémon est très insouciant. Quand il nage,
il fonce tête la première dans la coque des bateaux.

Maraiste trouve sa nourriture en laissant sa bouche ouverte
dans l’eau, et attend que ses proies y pénètrent sans faire
attention. Comme ce Pokémon est inactif, il n’a jamais
très faim.

Maraiste trouve sa nourriture en laissant sa bouche ouverte
dans l’eau, et attend que ses proies y pénètrent sans faire
attention. Comme ce Pokémon est inactif, il n’a jamais
très faim.

Il a tendance à se cogner la tête contre la coque
des navires et les rochers, mais, imperturbable,
il continue de nager comme si de rien n’était.

Il est toujours gluant. Quand il nage, il se cogne
souvent la tête au fond des rivières, mais semble
s’en moquer.

Ein träges Pokémon, das auf dem Grund des Flusses
liegt und wartet, dass ihm Beute ins Maul schwimmt.

Dieses genügsame Pokémon ist sehr umgänglich.
Beim Schwimmen stößt es immer wieder gegen Schiffe.

Morlord jagt seine Nahrung, indem es im Wasser sein Maul
weit aufmacht und auf unvorsichtige Beute wartet. Da sich
dieses Pokémon nicht bewegt, wird es auch nicht besonders
hungrig.

Morlord jagt seine Nahrung, indem es im Wasser sein Maul
weit aufmacht und auf unvorsichtige Beute wartet. Da sich
dieses Pokémon nicht bewegt, wird es auch nicht besonders
hungrig.

Es ist sehr unbekümmert und stört sich nicht
daran, wenn es während des Schwimmens an
Boote oder Felsen stößt.

Es hat einen äußerst glitschigen Körper. Beim
Schwimmen stößt es sich regelmäßig den Kopf
am Flussgrund, was ihm aber egal zu sein scheint.

Es un Pokémon bastante perezoso. Para pescar
permanece en el fondo del río con la boca abierta.

Este despreocupado Pokémon es de naturaleza
tranquila. Siempre que nada, choca con los barcos.

Quagsire caza dejando las fauces abiertas en el agua y
esperando a que su presa entre sin darse cuenta. Como se
queda quieto, el Pokémon no pasa mucha hambre.

Quagsire caza dejando las fauces abiertas en el agua y
esperando a que su presa entre sin darse cuenta. Como se
queda quieto, el Pokémon no pasa mucha hambre.

Es de naturaleza tranquila. Permanece impasible
cuando, al nadar, choca de cabeza contra rocas
de río o el casco de los barcos.

Su cuerpo siempre resulta escurridizo al tacto.
Suele chocarse contra el lecho del río al nadar,
pero no le importa demasiado.

È pigro per natura. Sta sul fondo dei fiumi con la
bocca aperta in attesa di afferrare la preda.

Questo Pokémon sbarazzino non si fa grossi problemi:
nuotando urta sempre gli scafi delle barche.

In acqua Quagsire attende la preda tenendo sempre la bocca
spalancata per catturare qualche ignaro malcapitato.
Poiché questo Pokémon non fa molto moto, non è mai
troppo affamato.

In acqua Quagsire attende la preda tenendo sempre la bocca
spalancata per catturare qualche ignaro malcapitato.
Poiché questo Pokémon non fa molto moto, non è mai
troppo affamato.

È molto tranquillo per natura. Non si scompone
se nuotando sbatte la testa contro lo scafo delle
barche o le rocce dei fiumi.

Ha un corpo molto viscido. Spesso, nuotando,
sbatte la testa sul letto dei fiumi, ma non
se ne preoccupa.

This carefree
POKéMON has an
easy-going nature. While swimming, it
always bumps into
boat hulls.

Due to its relaxed
and carefree atti­
tude, it often bumps its head on
boulders and boat
hulls as it swims.

Its body is always
slimy. It often
bangs its head on the river bottom
as it swims but
seems not to care.

QUAGSIRE hunts for food by leaving
its mouth wide open in water and waiting
for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the POKéMON does not move,
it does not get very hungry.

QUAGSIRE hunts for food by leaving
its mouth wide open in water and waiting
for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because the POKéMON does not move,
it does not get very hungry.

A QUAGSIRE hunts by leaving its mouth wide
open in water and waiting for its prey to
blunder in. Because it doesn’t move, it
does not get very hungry.

Due to its relaxed and carefree attitude,
it often bumps its head on boulders and
boat hulls as it swims.

This carefree POKéMON has an easygoing
nature. While swimming, it always bumps
into boat hulls.

It has a sluggish nature. It lies
at the river’s bottom, waiting for
prey to stray into its mouth.

A dim-witted Pokémon. It doesn’t
care if it bumps its head into
boats or rocks while swimming.

It has an easygoing nature. It
doesn’t care if it bumps its head on
boats and boulders while swimming.

This carefree Pokémon has an
easy-going nature. While swimming,
it always bumps into boat hulls.

Due to its relaxed and carefree
attitude, it often bumps its head on
boulders and boat hulls as it swims.

It has an easygoing nature. It
doesn’t care if it bumps its head on
boats and boulders while swimming.

It has an easygoing nature. It
doesn’t care if it bumps its head on
boats and boulders while swimming.

It has an easygoing nature. It
doesn’t care if it bumps its head on
boats and boulders while swimming.

It has an easygoing nature. It
doesn’t care if it bumps its head on
boats and boulders while swimming.

It has a sluggish nature. It lies at the river’s bottom,
waiting for prey to stray into its mouth.

This carefree Pokémon has an easygoing nature.
While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in
water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because
the Pokémon does not move, it does not get very hungry.

Quagsire hunts for food by leaving its mouth wide open in
water and waiting for its prey to blunder in unaware. Because
the Pokémon does not move, it does not get very hungry.

It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it
bumps its head on boats and boulders
while swimming.

Its body is always slimy. It often bangs its head
on the river bottom as it swims but seems not
to care.

就算脑袋撞上船底或河里的岩石，
也完全不会去在意，悠然自在地
游泳的悠闲宝可梦。

身体总是滑溜溜的。
虽然游泳时头总会撞到河底，
但它自己毫不在意。
